name: CHARLIE
description: Itsy bitsy Charlie Put on a crazy show She let down her hair And made off with all your dough In came the crowd It filled up the circus tent So Charlie weaved away while Taking every cent!
descriptionHtml:
Itsy bitsy Charlie
Put on a crazy show
She let down her hair
And made off with all your dough
In came the crowd
It filled up the circus tent
So Charlie weaved away while
Taking every cent!
